SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Interface ITypeManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TypeManager
public interface ITypeManager
Interface defining methods used in the type manager, CRUD methods and extra methods for searching and finding specific types.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addType(Type type)
    CRUD method to add a type to the database
    void
    deleteType(Type type)
    CRUD method to delete a type in the database.
    List<Type>
    getAllTypes()
    Gets all types that exist in the database.
    Type
    getType(String typeName)
    Searches for and gets a specific type in the database based on the type's name.
    Type
    getTypeByID(int typeID)
    Searches for and gets a specific type in the database based on the type's ID.
    void
    updateType(Type type)
    CRUD method to update a type that exists in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addType

      int addType(Type type)
      CRUD method to add a type to the database
      Parameters:
      type - The type to add.
      Returns:
      The ID value of the type in the database.

    • updateType

      void updateType(Type type)
      CRUD method to update a type that exists in the database. All values for the type model should be included in this.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to update.

    • deleteType

      void deleteType(Type type)
      CRUD method to delete a type in the database. If this method is called it should be assumed the type is deleted and unrecoverable. Which type to delete depends on the implementation and which values are used to find the type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to delete.

    • getAllTypes

      List<Type> getAllTypes()
      Gets all types that exist in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all types.

    • getType

      Type getType(String typeName)
      Searches for and gets a specific type in the database based on the type's name.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type to search for.
      Returns:
      The type if found.

    • getTypeByID

      Type getTypeByID(int typeID)
      Searches for and gets a specific type in the database based on the type's ID.
      Parameters:
      typeID - The ID of the type to search for.
      Returns:
      The type if found.
